author: gunther
msg: HIVE-4827: Merge a Map-only task to its child task (Yin Huai via Gunther Hagleitner)

author: gunther
msg: HIVE-4843: Refactoring MapRedTask and ExecDriver for better re-usability and readability (Vikram Dixit K via Gunther Hagleitner)

author: brane
msg: Begin extending spillbufs so that we can use them for compressed pristines.
Add new fields delete_on_close, spill_all_contents, dirpath and temp_path.
(init_spillbuf): New. Initializes a spillbuf, defaulting the new fields.
(svn_spillbuf__reader_create): Likewise; do away with the cut-and-paste
(svn_spillbuf__write): Use the new svn_spillbuf_t fields when creating

author: tedyu
msg: HBASE-8768 Improve bulk load performance by moving key value construction from map phase to reduce phase (Rajshbabu)
